Monopoly.Tiles

Class UtilityTile

  • java.lang.Object
    • Monopoly.Tiles.Tile
      • Monopoly.Tiles.OwnableTile
        • Monopoly.Tiles.UtilityTile

  • public class UtilityTile
extends OwnableTile
    The UtilityTile class is a subclass of Tile which has specific algorithms for getting rent amounts.
